directions: Combine green beans, tomatoes, red pepper flakes, and garlic salt in a saucepan; cook over medium heat until heated through, 5 to 10 minutes.
ingredients: 1 (14.5 ounce) can diced tomatoes, with liquid
1/2 teaspoon red pepper flakes, or to taste
1/8 teaspoon garlic salt, or to taste
title: Hot and Spicy Green Beans with Tomato
